column1: bonnie e. neville| uhrichsville bonnie ellen neville
column3: a resident of beacon pointe nursing and rehab center died saturday
column5: 2015 at the rehab center. she was born april 30
column6: 1942 in blissfield to the late milton andrew and mildred charlene (fox) neville. bonnie was a dietary aide having worked at scenic view care center in millersburg and riverside manor in newcomerstown. she was a member of the clark township baptist church. she enjoyed crafts
column8: and playing the organ. she is survived by her sister
column9: carol ann porter of port washington. a sister-in-law
column10: janice neville of wooster. a nephew
column11: mark a. (kelly) porter of bolivar. great nephews
column12: kyle (devan) porter of bolivar and nick (whitney) porter of mineral city. she was preceded in death by her daughter
column19: joe porter. funeral services will be held wednesday
column21: 2015 at 11:00 a. m. at the fischer funeral home in warsaw with pastor c. e. sonny easterday officiating. burial will be in the blissfield cemetery. visitation is tuesday
column23: 2015 from 6-7:30 p. m. at the funeral home. www. fischerfuneralhome. com in lieu of flowers
column24: contributions may be made to hospice of tuscarawas county 716 commercial ave. sw new philadelphia
